name: Full Plate Armor
description:
A masterwork suit of interlocking steel plates, offering the pinnacle of physical protection. It provides +4 Armor but gives you disadvantage on all DEX-based rolls. This armor is clumsy and noisy.

Immovable Object

(Passive)

You are immune to unwilling movement from Push, Pull, or Crush effects of 2 or less.

name: Spidersilk Robes
description:
Robes woven from the silk of giant spiders, enchanted to be unnaturally tough and resistant to toxins. It provides +0 Armor.

Poison Resistance

(Passive)

You have advantage on all rolls to resist the Poisoned condition, and you take half damage from all poison sources.

Web Snare

(Reaction) When an enemy hits you with a melee attack, you can spend your reaction and 1 MP to release a burst of sticky webbing. Roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: The attacker is Immobilized for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: The attacker is Slowed for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The webbing is weak and has no effect.

name: Gladiator's Battlegear
description:
Asymmetrical, intimidating plate armor designed for the arena. It prioritizes a mix of vital protection and freedom of movement for aggressive fighting. It provides +3 Armor.

For the Crowd!

Once per combat, when you defeat an enemy, you can play to the crowd (even a hypothetical one). Roll+CHA.

  • On a 16+: The roar of the crowd invigorates you. You regain 1d8 HP and 1d6 SP.
  • On a 9-15: You regain 1d8 HP.
  • On a 1-8: Your display is seen as arrogant, and one of your remaining foes becomes Taunted by you.

name: Shaman's Mail
description:
A suit of chainmail adorned with totemic fetishes and elemental runes that hum with power. It provides +2 Armor.

Spirit of the Wolf

Once per combat, you can use your action to gain the 'Ghost Wolf' effect. For 2 rounds, your SPEED is increased by 4 and your movement is a Shift that can pass through enemy spaces. You cannot attack while this is active.

name: Druid's Leathers
description:
Armor made from the enchanted hides of wild beasts, adorned with living leaves and vines. It moves as if it were a second skin. It provides +1 Armor.

Wildheart

(Passive)

When you use your Wild Shape feature, the transformation does not cost MP.

name: Grimoire (Weapon)
description:
A heavy, magically-bound spellbook that can be wielded as a focus to unleash blasts of raw, untamed magic. Range: Ranged (8 squares).

You can devote crystals to this item to unlock its hidden potential.

Unleash Tome

When you use your action to fire a blast of raw magic, spend 1 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD + 5 as magical damage and may Push 1 the target.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your MD.
  • On a 1-8: The magic is uncontrolled. You deal 1d6 magical damage to a random target (friend or foe) within range.

name: Earthbreaker Mace
description:
A heavy mace made of magically hardened stone. Each impact resonates with the power of the earth. Range: Melee (1 square).

Tremor Strike

(Passive) When you get a High Hit (16+) on a Hack & Slash attack, the impact creates a tremor. All other creatures adjacent to your target must roll+DEX or be knocked prone.

Fissure

When you spend your action to slam the ground, spend 1 MP and roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: A fissure erupts in a 3-square line in front of you. The line becomes difficult terrain, and any creature who enters it takes 1d6 damage.
  • On a 9-15: You create a 2-square line of difficult terrain.
  • On a 1-8: The ground shakes, but only your square becomes difficult terrain.

name: Starlight Rapier
description:
A duelist's blade forged from a fallen star. It is unnaturally light and shimmers with a faint, illusory glow. Range: Melee (1 square).

Mirror Image

(Reaction) When an enemy targets you with an attack, you can spend your reaction and 1 MP to create illusory duplicates. Roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: You create two duplicates. The next two attacks against you automatically miss, destroying one duplicate each time.
  • On a 9-15: You create one duplicate. The next attack against you misses.
  • On a 1-8: The illusion is flawed. The next attack against you has disadvantage.

name: Plague-Dipped Stiletto
description:
A thin-bladed dagger permanently enchanted with a virulent, magical disease. Range: Melee (1 square).

Septic Strike

(Passive) When you deal HD with this weapon, the target is afflicted with a magical disease. At the start of their next turn, they must roll+CON.

  • On a 16+: They fight off the disease.
  • On a 9-15: They take your MD and are Weakened for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: They take your MD and are Stunned for 1 round.

name: Boomstick
description:
A masterfully engineered gnomish shotgun that fires a cone of shrapnel and concussive force. It is loud, powerful, and prone to overheating. Range: Ranged (Cone 4). Requires 2 actions to reload.

Dragon's Breath

When you make a Volley attack, spend 1 MP to load a special shell. Roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD as fire damage to all targets in the cone. If a target's DEX is less than your INT, they are also set Ablaze for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD as fire damage to all targets in the cone.
  • On a 1-8: The weapon backfires, dealing half your HD as fire damage to you and making you Weakened for 1 round.

name: Warglaives (Paired)
description:
A pair of elegant, double-bladed weapons, iconic to elven demon hunters. Requires two hands to wield. Range: Melee (1 square).

Blade Dance

When you use your action to perform a whirlwind of strikes, spend 2 HP and roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD to your primary target, and then half your HD to up to two other enemies within 1 square.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD to your primary target and half HD to one other enemy within 1 square.
  • On a 1-8: You deal your HD to your primary target, but leave yourself open and are Weakened for 1 round.

name: Long-Rifle
description:
A beautifully crafted rifle with a long, rune-etched barrel and a crystal focusing lens instead of a normal sight. Range: Ranged (30 squares). Requires an action to reload.

Arcane Shot

When you make a Volley attack, you can spend 1 MP to empower the shot with magic. Roll+INT instead of DEX.

  • On a 16+: The shot deals your MD. If the target's DEX is less than your INT, they are also Slowed for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: The shot deals your MD.
  • On a 1-8: The shot deals half your MD.

name: Warpike
description:
A long pike tipped with an arcane focusing crystal that thrums with stored energy. Range: Melee (3 squares, Reach).

Force Lunge

When you use your action to make a special thrust, spend 1 MP and roll+STR.

  • On a 16+: A blast of force erupts from the tip. You deal your MD to up to two enemies in a straight line within your reach and may Push 1 them.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your MD to the first enemy in the line.
  • On a 1-8: The energy backfires, inflicting Push 1 on you and making you Weakened for 1 round.

name: Scepter of Command
description:
A ceremonial mace that acts as a symbol of authority and a conduit for social power. It is surprisingly sturdy. Range: Melee (1 square).

You can devote crystals to this item to unlock its hidden potential.

Commanding Word

When you use your action to issue a one-word command (e.g., 'Grovel,' 'Flee,' 'Stop'), spend 2 SP and roll+CHA.

  • On a 16+: Choose one target who can hear you. If their WIS is less than your CHA, they are compelled to obey for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: The target is only compelled to hesitate; they are Weakened for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: They openly defy your command and are now immune to this ability for the rest of the scene.

name: Ritual Dagger
description:
A wicked, obsidian dagger used in profane rituals. It seems to drink the light and whispers promises of power in exchange for sacrifice. Range: Melee (1 square).

Sacrificial Strike

When you make a Hack & Slash attack, you can choose to sacrifice your own life force. Before you roll, take up to 5 irreducible damage.

  • For every 1 HP you sacrifice, your attack deals an additional +1 magical damage on a hit. If your attack is a High Hit (16+), you may also choose to heal an ally within 3 squares for half the amount of HP you sacrificed.

name: Spellfire Handwraps
description:
Strips of enchanted cloth that wrap around the hands and forearms. They allow a spellcaster to channel raw magic through their unarmed strikes. Range: Melee (1 square).

You can devote crystals to this item to unlock its hidden potential.

Arcane Fist

When you make an unarmed Hack & Slash attack, you may roll+INT instead of STR. The attack deals magical damage (MD) instead of physical damage (HD).

Blast Wave

When you successfully hit with an unarmed attack, you can spend 2 MP to release a wave of force. Roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You Push 2 the target and they are Weakened for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: You Push 1 the target.
  • On a 1-8: The backlash pushes you back 1 square instead.

name: Totemic War-Club
description:
A heavy club carved with primal symbols and adorned with feathers and stones. It hums with the power of the elements. Range: Melee (1 square).

Spirit of the Earth

When you use your action to slam the club on the ground, spend 1 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: A 2-square line of shattered earth erupts in front of you. It becomes difficult terrain, and any enemy starting their turn there is Immobilized for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: You create a 2-square line of difficult terrain.
  • On a 1-8: The ground shakes violently under your own feet, making you Immobilized for 1 round.

name: Lifestealer's Dirk
description:
A cruel, jagged dagger that seems to drink the light. It pulses with a faint, sickly energy, promising vitality at a terrible price. Range: Melee (1 square).

Vampiric Strike

(Passive) When you successfully deal HD with this weapon, you may choose to take 1d4 SD. If you do, you heal HP equal to the HD you dealt. This effect can only be used once per round.

name: Aegis of Command
description:
A magnificent shield of gleaming, golden metal that inspires allies and directs the flow of battle. It can be used as a weapon. Range: Melee (1 square).

You can devote crystals to this item to unlock its hidden potential.

Coordinated Assault

When you use your action to direct an attack, choose an ally within 5 squares and an enemy. Roll+CHA.

  • On a 16+: Your ally may immediately use their Reaction to make an attack against the chosen enemy with advantage.
  • On a 9-15: Your ally may use their Reaction to make an attack against the enemy.
  • On a 1-8: Your command is confusing. The chosen ally is Weakened for 1 round.

name: Katana
description:
A masterfully forged single-edged blade with a gentle curve, known for its incredible sharpness and swiftness. Range: Melee (1 square).

Iaijutsu Strike

If you did not attack on your previous turn, you can use your action to make a lightning-fast draw and strike. Roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD + 5 and inflict Bleeding for half your HD for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD and inflict Bleeding for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: You deal your HD, but the clumsy draw leaves you Weakened for 1 round.

name: Moon Glaive
description:
A three-bladed throwing weapon favored by elven sentinels. It magically returns to the thrower's hand after being thrown. Range: Ranged (8 squares).

Ricochet Blade

When you make a Volley attack, you can spend 1 MP to have the glaive bounce to another target. Roll+DEX.

  • On a 16+: You deal your HD to your primary target, and it bounces to a second enemy within 3 squares, dealing half your HD to them.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your HD to your primary target, but the bounce misses.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half HD to your primary target, and the glaive bounces wildly, hitting the nearest creature to the target (friend or foe) for 1d4 damage.

name: Runeblade
description:
A cruel-looking longsword etched with glowing frost-runes that drain the life and warmth from its victims. Range: Melee (1 square).

Icy Touch

(Passive) When you deal HD with this weapon, your target is also afflicted with a chilling frost, making them Slowed for 1 round.

Death Coil

When you use your action to unleash the blade's unholy energy, spend 2 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD as necrotic damage to a target within 6 squares. If the target is undead, it heals for that amount instead.
  • On a 9-15: You deal half your MD.
  • On a 1-8: The unholy energy backlashes, dealing 1d6 necrotic damage to you.

name: Gavel of Justice
description:
A heavy, ornate warhammer that glows with a soft golden light. It feels warm to the touch for the righteous, and cold to the wicked. Range: Melee (1 square).

Judgment

When you use your action to strike a foe and judge their soul, spend 1 MP and roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You deal your MD. If the target is Undead or Demonic, they are also Stunned for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: You deal your MD.
  • On a 1-8: You deal half your MD.

Consecration

Once per combat, when you strike the ground with the gavel as an action, you create a 2-square radius of hallowed ground around you for 2 rounds. Enemies who start their turn in the area are Weakened.

name: Sun Blade
description:
The hilt of this sword is exquisitely crafted, but it has no blade. When the command word is spoken, a blade of pure, searing sunlight erupts from the crossguard. Range: Melee (1 square).

Searing Light

(Passive) When you deal HD with this weapon, it is considered magical. Against Undead and Demonic creatures, your attacks with this weapon are Brutal (roll damage twice, take the best result).

Sun Flash

When you spend an action to present the blade, spend 1 MP and roll+CHA.

  • On a 16+: You create a brilliant flash of light. All creatures in a 4-square cone are Blinded for 1 round.
  • On a 9-15: All creatures in the cone are Weakened for 1 round.
  • On a 1-8: The blade's light falters, dealing 1d4 magical damage to you.

name: Staff of Thunders
description:
A staff built by storm-worshipping cultists, crackling with contained lightning. Range: Melee (2 squares, Reach).

Thunderstrike

When you cast a spell that deals damage, you can spend 1 MP to infuse it with lightning. The spell deals an additional +3 damage, and the target is Deafened for 1 round.

Thunderclap

When you spend your action to slam the staff on the ground, roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You create a deafening thunderclap. All creatures within 2 squares are Deafened and Pushed 1 away from you.
  • On a 9-15: All adjacent creatures are Pushed 1.
  • On a 1-8: The sound backfires into your own ears, leaving you Deafened for 1 round.

name: Plate Armor
description:
A full suit of interlocking metal plates, offering excellent protection at the cost of mobility. It provides +3 Armor but gives you disadvantage on all DEX-based rolls. This armor is clumsy and noisy.

Deflection

(Reaction) When you are hit by a melee attack, you can spend your reaction to angle your armor. Roll a d6.

  • On a 5-6: The blow glances off harmlessly. You take no damage.
  • On a 2-4: You partially deflect it, taking half damage.
  • On a 1: You fail to angle correctly and take full damage.

Unstoppable Juggernaut

Effect Type: Passive

Your sheer momentum makes you difficult to stop. You are immune to the Immobilized and Slowed conditions from non-magical sources.

name: Imp in a Ball
description:
A lesser imp has been magically bound inside a small, purple crystal ball. It offers cynical advice and complains constantly, but can be released to cause magical chaos.

In a timed scene, you can 'Unleash Imp'.

Unleash Imp

When you spend your action and 2 MP to release the imp, roll+CHA.

  • On a 16-19: The imp appears and will obey you for 2 rounds. On its turn, it can cast a 'Fel Flame' attack that deals your character's MD at a range of 6 squares.
  • On a 9-15: The imp appears for 2 rounds but is unruly, attacking the nearest creature each turn (friend or foe).
  • On a Miss: The imp refuses to come out, instead launching a 'Fel Flame' attack at you from inside the ball before sulking.

name: Wisp
description:
A benevolent nature spirit, appearing as a floating ball of faint light. It cannot attack, but it can drain magical energy and detonate to dispel harmful effects.

In a timed scene, it can 'Detonate'.

Detonate

When you command the wisp to detonate, it moves to any square within its SPEED and explodes. Roll+WIS.

  • On a 16-19: The wisp is destroyed. All allies within a 2-square radius of it are healed for 1d8 HP, and one magical debuff of your choice is removed from each of them.
  • On a 9-15: The wisp is destroyed, and allies in the radius are healed for 1d8 HP, but no debuffs are removed.
  • On a Miss: The wisp is destroyed, but the magical energy feedback causes all allies in the radius to become Weakened for 1 round.

name: Gryphon
description:
A majestic and intelligent flying mount with the body of a lion and the head and wings of an eagle. It is a symbol of courage and royalty.

In a timed scene, you can command it to perform a 'Diving Strike'.

Diving Strike

When you are mounted on your gryphon and dive towards an enemy, roll+DEX.

  • On a 16-19: The gryphon rakes the target with its talons for 2d6 HD. After the attack, you may move the gryphon up to half its SPEED.
  • On a 9-15: The gryphon deals 2d6 HD, but must land adjacent to the target.
  • On a Miss: The dive is poorly timed; the target gets a free attack against the gryphon as it passes.

name: Gnomish Repeating Crossbow
description:
An intricate clockwork crossbow of gnomish design with an internal magazine, allowing for rapid firing. It deals 1d8 HD and has the Ranged (15 squares) range. It does not need to be reloaded after every shot.

You can devote crystals to this weapon to unlock its special firing modes.

Rapid Fire

When you unleash a quick volley of bolts, spend 10 Focus and roll+DEX.

  • On a 16-19: You fire three bolts at once. You can hit up to three different targets, dealing your HD to each.
  • On a 9-15: You fire two bolts, hitting up to two different targets for your HD each.
  • On a Miss: The mechanism jams. You must spend your next action clearing it.

name: Flintlocke's Pistol
description:
A masterfully crafted pistol, surprisingly accurate for a gunpowder weapon. It deals 1d8 HD and has the Ranged (8 squares) range. Requires an action to reload.

You can devote crystals to this weapon to unlock its special abilities.

Aimed Shot

When you take a moment to line up your shot, spend your action and roll+DEX.

  • On a 16-19: Your next shot this combat is a guaranteed Strong Hit (16-19 result).
  • On a 9-15: Your next shot this combat gains +3 forward.
  • On a Miss: You lose your focus and are Weakened for 1 round.

Disrupting Shot

(Reaction) When an enemy within 8 squares begins to cast a spell, you can spend your reaction to fire a shot. Roll+DEX.

  • On a 16-19: You deal your HD and the enemy's spell is interrupted.
  • On a 9-15: The enemy's spell is interrupted, but you deal no damage.
  • On a Miss: You miss, and the spell hits with greater effect.

name: Gnomish Steam Strider
description:
A single-pilot, bipedal clockwork walker powered by a volatile steam engine. It's not heavily armored, but it is surprisingly fast and can leap over obstacles.

You can devote crystals to this vehicle to command it in special ways.

Overload Boiler

When you push the engine to its limits, spend 1 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16-19: For 2 rounds, the strider's SPEED is doubled, and its basic Stomp attack deals an extra 1d8 MD (fire).
  • On a 9-15: The effect lasts for only 1 round.
  • On a Miss: The boiler explodes! The strider is destroyed, dealing 2d8 MD to the pilot and all adjacent creatures.

Rocket Leap

When you activate the jump jets, roll+DEX.

  • On a 16-19: You can leap to any empty square within 8 squares, landing safely.
  • On a 9-15: You leap, but the landing is rough. You are Weakened for 1 round.
  • On a Miss: You leap 1d6 squares in a random direction and land prone.

name: Dwarven Siege Engine
description:
A powerful, slow-moving war machine that is part battering ram, part mobile fortress. It requires a crew to operate and can launch massive projectiles.

You can devote crystals to this vehicle to unlock its special abilities.

Fire Catapult

When you spend an action to fire the catapult at a target square you can see within 30 squares, roll+INT.

  • On a 16-19: The projectile hits its mark, dealing 3d8 MD (fire) to all creatures in a 3-square radius and setting the area Ablaze for 2 rounds.
  • On a 9-15: The projectile is slightly off-target, landing 1d4 squares away in a random direction.
  • On a Miss: The arm jams or the ammunition explodes prematurely, dealing 2d8 MD to the Siege Engine itself.

name: Gnomish Flying Machine
description:
A rickety, one-person airship held aloft by whirring rotors and questionable physics. It's fragile but offers unparalleled mobility over any terrain.

You can devote crystals to this vehicle to unlock its special abilities.

Evasive Maneuvers

(Reaction) When the flying machine is targeted by an attack, the pilot can spend their reaction and roll+DEX.

  • On a 16-19: You deftly dodge, and the attack misses. You may immediately move 2 squares.
  • On a 9-15: You dodge, but the strain on the engine causes it to stall. Your SPEED is halved for your next turn.
  • On a Miss: The controls jam and the attack hits with advantage.

name: Orc Kodo Beast
description:
A massive, lumbering beast of burden and war, native to the plains of Kalimdor. Its thick hide provides natural armor, and its sheer size is a weapon in itself.

You can devote crystals to this mount to unlock its special abilities.

War Drums

When a rider on the kodo's back spends an action to beat the war drums mounted on its sides, roll+CHA.

  • On a 16-19: The thunderous rhythm is inspiring. All allies within a 5-square radius gain advantage on their next HD attack roll.
  • On a 9-15: All allies within 3 squares gain +3 forward on their next HD attack roll.
  • On a Miss: The rhythm is off-putting, and all allies within 5 squares are Weakened for 1 round.

name: Aetheric Compass
description:
This is no ordinary compass. Instead of a magnetic needle, a magically suspended crystal shard floats within its housing. It does not point north; it slowly rotates to align with the strongest source of raw magical energy within a one-mile radius.

You can devote crystals to this item to unlock its special abilities.

Pinpoint Ley Line

When you spend one minute concentrating on the compass, roll+WIS.

  • On a 16+: You get a clear vision of the magic's source and nature (e.g., 'a necrotic altar in the crypt below'). You regain 1d4 MP from the ambient energy.
  • On a 9-15: You get a strong sense of the magic's direction and school (e.g., 'illusion magic from the east tower').
  • On a 1-8: The magic is overwhelming or deceptive. The compass spins wildly, inflicting the Confused condition on you for 1 round.

name: Tome of Arcane Wards
description:
A heavy tome bound in treated hide, detailing the theory and practice of abjuration magic. Studying it for an hour can grant knowledge of how to counter specific magical effects.

You can devote crystals to this item to unlock its special abilities.

Warding Glyph

When you spend one minute and 2 MP to inscribe a temporary glyph on a creature or object, roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The glyph holds for one hour. Choose an energy type (fire, cold, lightning, etc.). The target gains resistance (half damage) to that energy type until the glyph expires.
  • On a 9-15: The glyph only lasts for 10 minutes.
  • On a 1-8: The glyph is unstable. It shatters on the first instance of taking the chosen damage type, dealing 1d6 magical damage to the bearer.

name: Choker of the Guardian
description:
A simple-looking but heavy iron choker etched with runes of protection. When worn, it forms a magical link between the wearer and a chosen ward.

You can devote crystals to this item to unlock its special abilities.

Guardian's Ward

At the start of a timed scene, you may choose one ally as your ward. While they are within 5 squares of you, you can use this item's reaction.

(Reaction) When your ward is hit by an attack, you can spend your reaction and 1 SP to roll+CON.

  • On a 16+: You intercept the full force of the blow. You take the damage and all effects instead of your ward.
  • On a 9-15: You intercept the attack, but you both take half damage.
  • On a 1-8: You are too slow. Your ward takes the full attack, and you take half damage from the magical backlash.

name: Tome of Whispers
description:
A book bound in human skin, its pages filled with incomprehensible, shifting text. It is said to contain every secret ever uttered in a moment of fear or betrayal. Consulting it is a dangerous act that taxes the mind.

You can devote crystals to this item to unlock its special abilities.

Whispers of the Damned

When you spend one minute reading from the tome and ask about a specific person or place, you take 1d6 SD and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: The tome reveals a deep, damning secret about your subject. You gain advantage on your next two rolls against them.
  • On a 9-15: The tome reveals a useful, but minor, secret. You gain advantage on your next roll against them.
  • On a 1-8: The whispers are a torrent of lies and madness. You take an additional 1d6 SD and are Confused for 1 round.

name: Warp-Woven Saddle
description:
A saddle woven with phase-silk from the Netherstorm. It feels strangely cool to the touch and seems to flicker at the edge of your vision. It allows a skilled rider to briefly shift their mount through space.

You can devote crystals to this item to unlock its special abilities.

Phase-Ride

While mounted, you can use your action to activate the saddle. Spend 1 MP and roll+INT.

  • On a 16+: You and your mount instantly Shift to an empty square you can see within 5 squares.
  • On a 9-15: You Shift up to 3 squares.
  • On a 1-8: The spatial magic is unstable. You and your mount teleport to a random empty square within 3 squares of your location.
